welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kawit, a charming city known for its rich history and cultural heritage. We invite you to explore our vibrant streets, delicious local cuisine, and warm hospitality while you enjoy your stay here.

restaurants.name: Kainan Sa Balsa
restaurants.description: Kainan Sa Balsa is a filipino restaurant located in Bacoor.

restaurants.name: Countryside Steakhouse & Cafè
restaurants.description: Countryside Steakhouse & Cafè is a steakhouse located in Kawit.
restaurants.address: Riverside Bldg, Covelandia Rd, 4100 Kawit, Cavite, Cavite

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in Bacoor.
restaurants.address: Phoenix Plaza, Brgy Talaba IV (at Aguinaldo Hwy & Zapote Rd), 4102 Bacoor City, Cavite

restaurants.name: Jollibee
restaurants.description: Jollibee is a fast food restaurant located in Lungsod ng Kabite.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, serving mostly Philippine Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, serving mostly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
